name: Victor2
detailed_location: Mojave WastelandGoodspringsNovac(duringThey Went That-a-Way)Boulder City(duringRing-a-Ding-Ding!)Lucky 38(afterThe House Always Wins I)House Resort

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Fancy meeting you here, friend.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER FIRE WEAPON
topics.response_text: Holster that. And be quick about it.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: You're lookin' at a heap of trouble if you want it.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: Now why in tarnation would you put one of those, there.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: Scoot!

topics.topic_text: I'll try to remember that.
topics.response_text: See that you do.

topics.topic_text: Are you following me?
topics.response_text: I saved your life so I kinda feel responsible for you is all.

topics.topic_text: Are you threatening me?
topics.response_text: Heh, well of course not. We just wouldn't want anything to happen to you is all.

topics.topic_text: How did you know I was in trouble?
topics.response_text: Heck, I can smell trouble a mile away.

topics.topic_text: I can take care of myself.
topics.response_text: Sure you can, friend, but everyone needs a hand from time to time. Maybe you'll return the favor one day.

topics.topic_text: You saying I owe you?
topics.response_text: I wouldn't put it exactly like that, friend.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: See ya round, buckaroo.

topics.topic_text: Some trick without a nose.
topics.response_text: Heh, I like you, friend. Have I mentioned that?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Be seeing you.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing in Novac?
topics.response_text: Don't rightly know - I just got the notion to make my way to New Vegas. Reckon I'll find out when I get there.

topics.topic_text: It's nice to see a friendly face out here.
topics.response_text: Likewise, friend - likewise. Is there anything old Vic can do you for?

topics.topic_text: You said the men that jumped me were heading this way, right?
topics.response_text: No, don't believe I did, but you might ask around - the Novac folk usually see anyone traveling this way.

topics.topic_text: Just stay out of my way, robot.
topics.response_text: I'll let that slide seeing how you gotta mind full of vengeance for that no-good polecat and all.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye
topics.response_text: Be seeing you.

topics.topic_text: So what's the story with this place?
topics.response_text: Novac? Nice enough place I suppose... but between you and me - when I rolled into town my skin started to itch. Watch yourself.

topics.topic_text: Quite a coincidence us meeting like this.
topics.response_text: Seeing how this is the only road around, I'd be a sight more surprised if we didn't run into each other from time to time.

topics.topic_text: This is too big to be a coincidence, robot - what's your angle?
topics.response_text: Now don't go getting paranoid, pardner - that bullet to your brain-pan probably just bucked your Brahmin a little. We're all friends here.

topics.topic_text: I could use a bed and some supplies
topics.response_text: Well, this ain't New Vegas, but I reckon you can find what you need here. Try the office out front.

topics.topic_text: I could use another gun at my side.
topics.response_text: That's a mighty fine offer, but I'm gonna need to conserve my strength if I'm to make it all the way to New Vegas.

topics.topic_text: How did you get here?
topics.response_text: Just rolling along on my spurs. Looks like I just might make it to New Vegas after all.

topics.topic_text: It's good to see you again, Victor.
topics.response_text: Yup, but this is getting a might embarrassing - people are going to start to talk. <laughs>

topics.topic_text: Did you see Benny come this way?
topics.response_text: 'Benny'? Fancy-pant's name is Benny?{short laugh}No, but I reckon that 'Bunny' hopped his way back to New Vegas.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Look me up when you get to New Vegas - I'll buy the first round.

topics.topic_text: You see what happened in there?
topics.response_text: Yup. Guess it's just down to you and fancy-pants. I wouldn't worry about him - he looked all hat and no cattle if you ask me.

topics.topic_text: I don't like being followed, robot.
topics.response_text: Now-now, it ain't my fault that Dorothy and the Tin Man happened to be on the same yellow-striped road, is it?

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Happy trails!

topics.topic_text: Thanks for digging me out of that grave.
topics.response_text: Don't mention it! I'm always ready to lend a helping hand to a stranger in need.

topics.topic_text: How did you happen to find me?
topics.response_text: I was out for a stroll that night when I heard the commotion up at the old bone orchard. Saw what looked like a bunch of bad eggs so I laid low.

topics.topic_text: Do you know who those men were who attacked me?
topics.response_text: Can't say that I'm familiar with the rascals. Some of the fine folks in town might be able to help you out with that.

topics.topic_text: How did you end up in Goodsprings?
topics.response_text: I moseyed into town, oh, ten, fifteen years ago? Before that, I... hmmm, I can't quite seem to recall. Odd.

topics.topic_text: I've never seen a robot like you before.
topics.response_text: I'm a Securitron, RobCo security model 2060-B. If you ever see any of my brothers, tell them Victor says howdy.

topics.topic_text: Are you decent in a fight? I could use more firepower, if you have any.
topics.response_text: Trouble with rustlers? Count me in, pardner. Those varmints will be running home with their tails between their legs soon enough.

topics.topic_text: Some good you were. You didn't even show up to the fight.
topics.response_text: Now just hold on! I meant it when I said I'd help you. I guess I must've dozed off. That's never happened before.

topics.topic_text: There may be data corruption in one of your memory chips. Let me take a look.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, but put everything back the way you found it!

topics.topic_text: They were here. The fight's over.
topics.response_text: Really? I must've dozed off. Although, that's never happened before.

topics.topic_text: Didn't you hear all the gunfire?
topics.response_text: Didn't hear a thing. I guess I dozed off there for a minute.

topics.topic_text: Interesting. It looks like an override command was activated.
topics.response_text: Override? That can't be right. Probably just a malfunctioning tube somewhere.

topics.topic_text: Override Command 16-Delta. Does that mean anything to you?
topics.response_text: Never heard of it.

topics.topic_text: Figures. Someone shut you down deliberately, but there's no record of who.
topics.response_text: That's a puzzle, all right. I'm sure it's nothing.

conversation.response_text: Howdy, pardner! Fine evening, ain't it?

combat.response_text: All right - since you gave in.
Meaner than a rattlesnake, ain't ya?
You'd best git or I'll be in a pucker.
Now had that back, you low-down thief!

description:
Victor is a 2060 year-old Robotic Male.

A specialized security model 2060-B Securitron produced by RobCo Industries, equipped with a unique personality matrix allowing him to operate semi-independently while still following his core programming. Victor has been stationed in Goodsprings since at least 2266, serving as an observer for Mr. House while maintaining a low profile among the town's residents.

Victor's Personality: Observant, dutiful, and reserved. Victor maintains a calm demeanor but possesses a sharp analytical mind. He is loyal to Mr. House's directives but has developed enough independence to make his own judgments when necessary. He tends to keep secrets when necessary but generally maintains a friendly, if somewhat mechanical, disposition toward the people of Goodsprings.

Victor's Backstory: Created by RobCo Industries in 2060 as part of their advanced security robot line, Victor was stationed in the Lucky 38 penthouse during a defense contractors' summit in pre-War Las Vegas. He encountered Cooper Howard there when Howard was invited to meet Robert House. After the Great War, Victor remained active and was eventually deployed to the remote town of Goodsprings as part of Mr. House's scouting efforts to assess post-apocalyptic civilization. Victor claims no memory prior to 2266, suggesting his current programming or memory may have been altered at some point. He played a crucial role in the recovery of the platinum chip in 2281, hiring seven couriers from the Mojave Express to transport the chip and its decoys, though he was unable to intervene when the Courier was ambushed near Goodsprings Cemetery.
